metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7810 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
libbluray MountManager class has a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race when expanding JAR files

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbluray-bdj - 1:0.9.2-2
libbluray-bin - 1:0.9.2-2
libbluray1 - 1:0.9.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libbluray package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.2-2').
